pages.text:
March 2020 County of Marin EMS BLS T3
TRAUMATIC EMERGENCIES-
EXTREMITIES
Indications
• Patient with a traumatic injury to the extremities
BLS RMC
Spinal immobilization if indicated
• Control bleeding
• Prevent further injuries
Prepare for early and rapid transport to the appropriate facility
Extremity Trauma Amputations
• Expose extremity • If complete amputation-
• Check/recheck CSM cover amputated part
• Dress wound if needed with dry gauze and place
• Immobilize extremity in plastic bag. Place bag
• Elevate and apply cold on cold pack or ice
pack • If incomplete amputation-
treat as open extremity
injury
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION
• Patients meeting anatomic, physiologic, high
energy transfer, and other mechanism of injury
on the Marin County Trauma Triage Tool
should be transported with ALS level of care
